flavorText: Through its watchful gaze, all slivers may see.

foreignData.flavorText: Durch sein wachsames Auge blicken alle Remasuris.
foreignData.name: Wächterremasuri
foreignData.text: Remasuri-Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Wachsamkeit. (Sie werden beim Angreifen nicht getappt.)

foreignData.flavorText: Todos los fragmentados verán a través de su vigilante mirada.
foreignData.name: Fragmentado centinela
foreignData.text: Las criaturas Fragmentado que controlas tienen la habilidad de vigilancia. (Estas criaturas no se giran al atacar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Son regard perçant profite à tous les autres slivoïdes.
foreignData.name: Slivoïde sentinelle
foreignData.text: Les créatures Slivoïde que vous contrôlez ont la vigilance. (Attaquer avec ces créatures ne les fait pas s'engager.)

foreignData.flavorText: Attraverso il suo sguardo vigile, tutti i tramutanti osservano.
foreignData.name: Tramutante Sentinella
foreignData.text: Le creature Tramutante che controlli hanno cautela. (Attaccano senza TAPpare.)

foreignData.flavorText: すべてのスリヴァーが、その隙のない視線を通して見ているのだ。
foreignData.name: 歩哨スリヴァー
foreignData.text: あなたがコントロールするスリヴァー・クリーチャーは警戒を持つ。（それらは攻撃してもタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スリヴァー

foreignData.flavorText: 그의 넓은 시야를 모든 슬리버가 공유한다.
foreignData.name: 보초 슬리버
foreignData.text: 당신이 조종하는 슬리버 생물들은 경계 능력을 가진다. (그 생물들은 공격해도 탭되지 않는다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Por meio de seu olhar atento, todos os fractius podem ver.
foreignData.name: Fractius Sentinela
foreignData.text: As criaturas do tipo Fractius que você controla têm vigilância. (Elas não são viradas para atacar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ее зоркими глазами смотрят все щепки.
foreignData.name: Дозорная Щепка
foreignData.text: Существа-Щепки под вашим контролем имеют Бдительность. (Атакуя, они не поворачиваются.)

foreignData.flavorText: 全体裂片妖藉由其谨慎目光保持警觉。
foreignData.name: 哨兵裂片妖
foreignData.text: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有警戒异能。（它们攻击时不需横置。）

foreignData.flavorText: 全體裂片妖藉由其謹慎目光保持警覺。
foreignData.name: 哨兵裂片妖
foreignData.text: 由你操控的裂片妖生物具有警戒異能。（它們攻擊時不需橫置。）

name: Sentinel Sliver
originalText: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

rulings.text: If you change the creature type of a Sliver you control so it’s no longer a Sliver, it will no longer be affected by its own ability. Its ability will continue to affect other Sliver creatures you control.

Abilities that Slivers grant, as well as power/toughness boosts, are cumulative. However, for some abilities, like flying, having more than one instance of the ability doesn’t provide any additional benefit.

text: Sliver creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
